text:
A highly driven student of maths and data science with a background in industry as a Chemical Engineer.  Quick to develop relationships with customers and colleagues.  Supportive and Collaborative as a team member.  Happy to work under my own initiative in high pressure environments.
Education
MSC Mathematics and Data Science, University of Stirling
September 2019 – September 2020
A 12-month master’s providing a solid foundation in the mathematical analysis of data-driven systems and development of the computing skills necessary to apply analytical techniques on a large scale.  A focus on the techniques used to approach data using computational analysis and understand the mathematics underpinning these techniques.  Analysis with the use of Python, R, and Weka. Education
MSC Mathematics and Data Science, University of Stirling
September 2019 – September 2020
A 12-month master’s providing a solid foundation in the mathematical analysis of data-driven systems and development of the computing skills necessary to apply analytical techniques on a large scale.  A focus on the techniques used to approach data using computational analysis and understand the mathematics underpinning these techniques.  Analysis with the use of Python, R, and Weka. Modules include:
Statistics for Data Science
Networks & Graph Theory
Representing and Manipulating Data
Commercial and Scientific Applications
Stochastic Processes and Optimisation
Data Analytics
Modelling in Financial and Medical Systems
MEng Chemical and Process Engineering, University of Strathclyde
